org.youscope.addon.measurement

Class MeasurementAddonFactoryAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.youscope.addon.measurement.MeasurementAddonFactoryAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MeasurementAddonFactory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CellDetectionMeasurementAddonFactory, ComposedImagingMeasurementAddonFactory, ContinousImagingMeasurementAddonFactory, MicroplateMeasurementAddonFactory, MultiCameraContinousImagingAddonFactory, SimpleMeasurementAddonFactory, TaskMeasurementAddonFactory, UserControlMeasurementAddonFactory

    public class MeasurementAddonFactoryAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements MeasurementAddonFactory
    Adapter simplifying addon creation.
    Author:
    Moritz Lang

    • Constructor Detail

      • MeasurementAddonFactoryAdapter

        public MeasurementAddonFactoryAdapter(java.lang.Class<? extends ComponentAddonUI<C>> configurationAddonClass,
                                      MeasurementInitializer<C> customInitializer,
                                      ComponentMetadata<C> metadata)
        Constructor. When invoked, the factory exposes the given addon.
        Parameters:
        configurationAddonClass - The UI exposed to the user.
        customInitializer - Object for measurement initialization.
        metadata - Metadata about this addon.

      • MeasurementAddonFactoryAdapter

        public MeasurementAddonFactoryAdapter()
        Constructor. Does no invoke any addon. Use addAddon() to expose addons later on.

        customInitializer - A custom initializer for the measurement.

        public boolean isSupportingTypeIdentifier(java.lang.String typeIdentifier)

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        typeIdentifier - The ID of the measurement configuration for which it should be querried if this addon supports its construction.
        Returns:

      • initializeMeasurement

        public void initializeMeasurement(Measurement measurement,
                                  MeasurementConfiguration configuration,
                                  ConstructionContext constructionContext)
                           throws ConfigurationException,
                                  AddonException
        Description copied from interface: MeasurementAddonFactory
        Called when this addon should initialize the the measurement according to its configuration.
        Specified by:
        initializeMeasurement in interface MeasurementAddonFactory
        Parameters:
        measurement - The measurement which should be initialized.
        configuration - The configuration according to which the measurement should be initialized.
        constructionContext - An interface to an object allowing to initialize the various measurement components.
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - Thrown if the configuration is invalid.
        AddonException - Thrown if an error occurred during the initialization.
